TopicTitle: Hotkey for debris destruction without confirmation

Articles.Content:
Generally I like the confirmation before destroying stuff, but it would be nice if I could hold a hotkey like ctrl and mash the delete button on all the debris I’ve carelessly left around Kerbin. 

Or as an alternate solution to the same problem, the ability to multi select items in the tracking center and destroy them in batches. The confirmation would still appear in that case, but I wouldn't have to do a two step process for every individual piece.
